RelatedSentence: Positions for welders , cooks , carpenters , a bike technician , creative director , truck drivers , package handlers , engineers and sales associates could be filled by 59 companies during a job fair Tuesday hosted by WorkOne Southern Indiana in New Albany .

A variety of employers - including Summit Trucking , Horseshoe Southern Indiana , Amazon , Sam 's Club , Home Depot , Connextions and Beach Mold and Tool - have 1,400 positions , ranging from labor to professional levels .
The event will be from 3 to 7 p.m. at the WorkOne Center , 2125 State St. Job seekers should bring several resumes , dress professionally and be prepared to discuss opportunities with employers .
